text: arivilladavaru, ‘‘allahaneke nam'modane matanaduvudilla? Athava nam'ma baligondu puraveyadaru yake baruvudilla?’’ Ennuttare. Avariginta hindinavaru avaru helidantaha matanne heliddaru. Avara manas'sugalu onde taraddagive. Drdha visvasaviruva janarigantu navu puravegalannu igagale vivarisi bittiddeve
